name: Grilled Mozzarella Appetizer
description: This grilled mozzarella appetizer is so easy, but elegant. Grilled on a cedar plank, its creamy, melty and oh-so-delicious with crostini!
instructions: Soak a cedar plank in water for at least 30 minutes, up to 4 hours. This will keep it from burning. Preheat your grill to medium high. Place your cheese on the plank and add preserves on top. Place plank on top of the grate. Grill 10 minutes with lid closed or until it appears to almost burst at the sides.
